add_token_info: If you have acquired an acces token you may include this token here.
are_you_sure_remove_node: Ste si istý, že chcete odstrániť toto zariadenie ?
are_you_sure_restore: Ste si istý, že chcete prepísať sieťovú konfiguráciu. Vytvorili ste zálohu?
assoc_legend_1: Not in device and not desired: not shown
assoc_legend_2: Selected in UI but not active in device yet
assoc_legend_3: Active in device but not selected in UI
assoc_legend_4: Selected in UI and active in device
assoc_max_nodes_reached: Počet associovaných uzlov dosiahol maximálny povolený počet
badly_routed: Communication through 1 node. There is 1 route
before_leaving_network: It is suggested that you make a backup of the node information before leaving the network. Click CANCEL to abort this operation if you wish to create a backup. Click OK to proceed.
bugreport_info: This form is dedicated to report bugs in the UI please do not provide any response. If you need support please consult the support forums or email addresses provided.
change_date_time_format: Change date and time format to chosen language or keep current settings?
configuration_not_supported: Configuration is not supported for this device or the interview has not been completed.
conf_apply_battery: Batéria zariadenia musí byť prebudená na aktivovanie zmien nastavení
detect_all_nodes: Detect all nodes ( may take some minutes)
device_changed_configuration: Zariadenie zmenilo konfiguráciu ale niektoré hodnoty nie sú zapísané. Čakať, pokým sa zariadenie nezobudí.
device_changed_configuration_battery: Device changed configuration but some values are not written. Wait for device to wake up.
device_included_info: Start the exclusion mode on the customer's primary controller and click the button below.
device_interview_stage_not_complete: Etapa interview zariadenia nie je kompletná
device_interview_wait_s2: Please wait for S2 interview to complete
device_not_included_info: Start the inclusion or learning mode on the customer's primary controller and click the button below.
device_not_included_description: To include into network, the controller must be reset.
email_invalid: Please enter a valid email address
enter_dsk: Please enter the Key on new Device (DSK - device specific keys), which you find below QR code
error_403: 403 Zakázané. Nemáte povolenie na zobrazenie tejto stránky!
error_bootloader_update: Došlo k chybe pri aktualizácii zavádzača.
error_firmware_update: Došlo k chybe pri aktualizácii firmvéru.
error_handling_data_remote: Nedájú sa obnoviť dáta zo vzdialeného servera.
error_load_data: Communication or binding error! Please login again or check system connectivity.
error_load_user: User not found. Please check your  login or password
error_nif_request: Unable to send a NIF request
error_xml_load: Unable to load a XML file
err_set_date_time: Unable to set date and time.
firmware_update_info: This will open new window. To update firmware, click on tab Advanced -> Firmware and continue according to the instruction.
firmware_update_remote: Firmware updates cannot be done when connected remotely.
firmware_uptodate: Your current firmware is up to date
forward_login_info: Activate this option if you don't want to be prompted for entering login credentials on on every local (same network) access.
fw_update_checksum_err: The device was unable to receive the requested firmware data without checksum error. Not updated.
fw_update_download_success_activation_cm: Firmware image downloaded successfully. Waiting for activation command.
fw_update_download_success_auto_upgrade: Firmware image downloaded successfully. The device will now start upgrading. Then the device will restart itself.
fw_update_download_success_manual_restar: Firmware image downloaded successfully. Manual restart needed.
fw_update_err_invalid_file_header_format: Invalid file header format. Not updated.
fw_update_err_invalid_file_header_info: Invalid file header information. Not updated.
fw_update_err_wrong_fw_id: The transferred image does not match the Firmware ID. Not updated.
fw_update_err_wrong_fw_target: The transferred image does not match the Firmware Target. Not updated.
fw_update_err_wrong_manufacturer_id: The transferred image does not match the Manufacturer ID. Not updated.
fw_update_receive_err: The device was unable to receive the requested firmware data. Not updated.
ie_last_element: just to remember, that IE do not like trailing comma (,) at the end the list of associative array elements
include_log_warning: This will include information about your Z-Wave network
inspect_queue_legend_help: n = Poslať počet, W = Počkať na prebudenie, S = Počkať na zabezpečenie, E = Zapuzdrený, D = Hotovo, U = Urgentné
language_select_reload_interface: Prosím znova načítajte stránku na aplikovanie zmien
lb_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this?
licence_upgrade_info: Firmvér Vášho Z-Wave vysielača obsahuje funkciu, ktorá vám umožní povoliť/zakázať niektoré funkcie hardvéru. Napr. maximálny počet povolených ovládaných zariadení alebo iné funkcie.
licence_upgrade_key: Ak ste obdržali licenčný klúč pre vylepšenie funkcií, môžte tento klúč použit a rozšíriť funkcie Z-Way.
link_health_no_powerlevel: This device does not allow Link Health Check to Neighbors. Only Route Quality to Controller can be tested.
link_to_device_description: Môžete vybrať popis zariadenia z tabuľky "Interview"
manual_route_error_battery_to_battery: Can not set route from battery device to a battery device
manual_route_error_battery_repeater: Can not set route with battery repeaters
manual_route_info: Select a manual route by clicking on nodes from source to destination via desired repeaters. Press Enter to validate the route, Esc to cancel.
name: Name
nm_change_controller_war: Spustí sa proces Inclusion (začlenovania), pre nový kontrolér. Tento kontrolér sa stane primárnym kontrolérom.
nm_chip_reboot_war: Toto tlačidlo resetuje sériový komunikáciu medzi softvérom kontroléra a firmvérom Z-Wave zariadenia. Je bezpečné na použitie.
nm_chip_reset_war: Reset celej siete a odstráni všetky odkazy na existujúce zariadenia. Používajte opatrne.
nm_controller_not_sis_or_primary: Kontrolér je sekundárny kontrolér v sieti, nemôže pridávať/odstraňovať zariadenia.
nm_controller_reset_war: Reset Kontroléra vymaže všetky pridané zariadenia zo siete bez toho aby ich najprv odobral (exclusion). Po tomto procese budete musieť manuálne pridávať(inclusion) a odoberať(exclusion) zariadenia znova. Chcete to naozaj spraviť ?
nm_controller_sis_or_primary: Kontrolér je pripravený na pridávanie(inclusion) a odoberanie(exclusion) zariadení zo siete.
nm_controller_state_1: Pripravený na pridávanie. Stlačte tlačidlo na zariadení pre (znovu-)pridanie.
nm_controller_state_13: Pripravený na pridanie nového primárneho zariadenia. Stlačte tlačidlo na zariadení pre pridanie.
nm_controller_state_15: Pridávajte nového primárneho zariadenia, prosím čakajte...
nm_controller_state_19: Náhrada Failed Node pripravená na pridanie nahradeného zariadenia. Táto akcia nepovoluje zrušenie procesu pridávania
nm_controller_state_5: Pripravený na odobratie(exclude). Stlačte tlačidlo na zariadení pre odobratie zariadenia.
nm_csa_pin: Enter PIN code on the device:
nm_include_limit_reached: Your RaZberry or UZB requires a license
nm_inc_into_nw_desc: This modes allows this controller to enter and leave a different network as normal node.
nm_learn_mode_empty_network: Zatiaľ nemáte žiadne pridané zariadenia. Môžte začat vytvoriť sieť s týmto kontrolérom ako primárnym alebo pridať tento kontrolér do existujúcej siete.
nm_learn_mode_war: Tento mód povoľuje kontroléru vstúpiť alebo opustiť sieť.
nm_learn_mode_you_are_primary_and_sis: Kontrolér je primárny v sieti. Je v špeciálnom SIS móde a tak hocijaký kontrolér v sieti môže byť pridaný alebo odstránený zo siete.
nm_learn_mode_you_are_primary_no_sis: Kontrolér je primárny v sieti. Môže len pridávať alebo odstranovať zariadenia zo siete.
nm_learn_mode_you_are_secondary_can_add: Kontrolér je sekundárny v sieti. Váš primárny kontrolér je v špeciálnom SIS móde a tak tento a iné kontroléri v sieti stále môžu pridávať a odstraňovať zariadenia zo siete.
nm_learn_mode_you_are_secondary_can_not_: Kontrolér je sekundárny v sieti. Nemôže pridávať alebo odstraňovať zariadenia zo siete. Použite váš primárny kontrolér na pridanie nových zariadení a odstránenie starých.
nm_mark_node_war: Sieťovo napájané uzly sú označené automaticky za nefunkčné. Batériovo napájané zariadenia musíte označiť sami na odstránenie alebo náhradu. Používajte opatrne.
nm_mark_node_war_modal: Kontrolér skontroluje, či je uzol zobudení a potom ho označí ako nefunkční. Tento proces trvá 30 sekúnd. Môžte odstrániť uzol ak potrebujete použitím "Odstrániť Nefunkčný Uzol" funkcie
nm_nif_all_war: Táto funkcia overí všetky uzly a žiada NIF. Môžte taktiež žiadať NIF pre každé individuálne zariadenia použivajúce [konfiguračnú tabuľku]
nm_remove_node_war: Vyberte nefunkčný uzol zo zoznamu a odstráňte ho zo sieťovej konfigurácie. Proces trvá okolo jednej minúty.
nm_replace_node_war: Vyberte uzol nefunkčného zariadenia. Po stlačení tlačidla, môžte pridať nové zariadenie priamo s týmto Node(Uzlovým) ID.
nodes_is_repeating: Nodes this node is repeating for
not_linked: Communication through 2 or more nodes. Unreliable communications
no_association_groups_found: Nedá sa nastaviť associácia: skupiny neboli overené zariadením. Overte.
no_device_installed: There is no device installed yet
no_device_service: This device doesn't have the necessary service
ntp_set_mode_info: En-/disable automatic time synchronisation via NTP (Network Time Protocol). A reboot is necessary.
ntp_set_time_info: Configure the server date and time manually if automatic time synchronisation is disabled. A reboot is necessary.
ntp_synchronize_info: Start manually synchronization of NTP service to get local time and date. Use this if NTP is not synchronized correctly. A reboot is necessary.
postfix_missingid: This device has missing product ID
promiscuous_mode_info: Important: If this function is inactive the application can not collect packages anymore
remote_access_error: Error: The Remote Access is currently not available.
remote_access_not_active: Please activate the Remote Access app.
rerouted_title: Bigger re-route rate means some routes fails
restore_backup_chip: Taktiež obnoví informáciu o sieťovej topológii (prosím prečítajte si najprv manuál!)
restore_done_reload_ui: Obnova kompletná! Prosím znova načítajte stránku
restore_secondary_primary: If you want to restore your secondary controller - do re-inclusion from your primary controller. If you want to restore another configuration - do a factory reset first.
RFRxCRC16Errors: Number of corrupted CRC16 Frames received
RFRxLRCErrors: Success on Reception (% ok versus % corrupted)
routed: Communication through 1 node. There are several routes
routes_reroute_ef_title: % of packets used to re-route on the from the node
route_map_annotation_a: All existing routes in the network
route_map_annotation_i: Routes from a node to controller
route_map_annotation_ima_absent: Your UZB/RaZberry/Hub do not have advanced network statistics. Upgrade the firmware
route_map_annotation_ima_few: Too few nodes to make statistics
route_map_annotation_lw_text1: proportional to the usage of this segment
route_map_annotation_lw_text2: proportional to link quality, thin if unknow
route_map_annotation_nc_text:
mains powered
sleeping
FLiRS
nodes this is repeating for
route_map_annotation_nst_text:
nodes this is associated with
nodes with problems
route_map_annotation_ns_text: proportional to the number of routes crossing this node
route_map_annotation_o: Routes from controller to a node
settings_box_reboot: In order to fully apply the changes a reboot is necessary. The box will be automatically rebooted after the settings has been saved.
sleeping_since_approximately: Can not precisely calculate next wakeup time
success_bootloader_update: Bootloader bol úspešne aktualizovaný. Prosím znovu načítajte stránku.
success_controller_include: Controller was (re-)included in network. Please select what do you want to do?
success_firmware_update: Firmvér bol úspešne aktualizovaný. Prosím znovu načítajte stránku.
success_send_report: Report was successfully saved. The copy was sent to your email address
test_all_links_complete: Link test on all links complete.
th_mwief_tip: Network Wide Inclusion and Explorer Frame
timing_black: Kontrolér nebol schopný 3 razy dosiahnuť uzol a skúsil inú cestu, ktorá nakoniec fungovala
timing_blue: Packets for the last hour are highlighted in blue
timing_color_description: Dekódovanie farebných hodnôt doby odozvy prístroja
timing_green: Doba odozvy nie je mimo prípustný rozsah
timing_red: Komunikácia nakoniec po niekoľkých pokusoch presmerovania zlyhala
txt_config_select: Vyberte zariadenie na nastavenie zo zoznamu vyššie
txt_controller_delete_node: Kontrolér zmaže uzol zo siete bez ďalšej akcie. Tento proces trvá okolo minúty.
txt_homepage_promo_default:
This complete Static Z-Wave Plus Controller is certified under No ZC10-14110009 in November 2014. Certification includes both the Z-Wave Controller stack and this Expert User Interface.

The controller supports all certified Z-Wave devices in the market.

For these devices the controller will use some meta data such as image orconfiguration option. However it is also possible to control Z-Wave compatible devices not listed in this database. Please refer to the device manual for configuration and usage information.

You can download the full users manual from z-wave.me
txt_inspect_queue: Inspect fronta otvorí druhé okno na monitorovanie príkazov vysielańých z kontroléra.
txt_uzb_info: Firmvér vášho Z-Wave vysielača má prístup k aktualizácii. Aktualizáciu by ste mali vykonať ak je požadovaná supportom, je možné, že určitý firmvér bude vyžadovať upgrade najprv board loader-a.
tz_set_info: The current time zone is: __ctz__. You can change the time zone if automatic time synchronisation is enabled. A reboot is necessary.
upload_allowed_formats: The uploaded file must be in one of the following formats: __extensions__
upload_allowed_size: The uploaded file must be smaller than __size__.
value_not_stored_indevice: ale nebola vložená do zariadenia, zatiaľ.
verify_included_pin: Verify PIN code for new device
wifi_password_valid: Password must between 8 and 63 characters long.
zwave_reinstalled: ZWave will be reinitialized. Reload the page after 15-20 sec to check if fixes are up to date.
nm_about_csa: S2 Authentication is done by entering this controller's PIN code in the primary controller (normal authentication) or by entering primary controller's PIN code in this controller (Client Side Authentication).
nm_include_start_tooltip: Add new device to the network
nm_exclude_start_tooltip: Remove a device from the network
z_way_restart: The system will now be automatically restarted. Redirect to homesite in __val__ __level__.
